name: Cozy Fireplace
description:
Made for Shadybug for the Strange Pact Secret Gift Giver Jam, with the prompt "Winter, and Monster-Romance"

This is a simple fire screen (complete with crackling). I've been busy so I didn't get much done with this(sorry), but the idea is your hanging out in your partners living room (who is a lich)

This barely qualifies of a game it's more something you have up while doing something else to give you serotonin.
